name: LISA: THE FIRST
summary: LISA: THE FIRST is a Yume-Nikkistyle exploration game. It was made in RPG Maker 2003 and released on October 9th, 2012. It is the predecessor to LISA: THE PAINFUL. It is an exploration of Lisa Armstrong's mind as she tries to cope with the burden of being abused by her father Marty before committing suicide.
